description: This PHP script handles AJAX requests for resetting and rebooting network device settings, including factory resets, WiFi reset, reboot commands, and user password resets. It performs validation, session management, and interacts with device configuration via setStr calls.

methods.name: delMacFilterTable
methods.description: Deletes MAC filter entries for specified WiFi SSIDs and disables MAC filtering.

methods.name: delMacFilterTables
methods.description: Deletes MAC filter entries for a predefined set of SSIDs (1, 2, 3, 5, 6).
